Hero.Title:
Discover Jepara.
Carve Your Story Here
Hero.Subtitle: Discover tropical beaches, rich history, and world-class wood carving masterpieces.
Profile.Label: Regional Profile
Profile.Title:
The Pearl of
The Peninsula.
Profile.Description: Jepara Regency, the jewel of Central Java's northern tip. An 83 km coastline uniting world-class carving culture with tropical natural beauty.
Profile.Pillars.Nature.Title: Nature
Profile.Pillars.Heritage.Title: Heritage
Profile.Pillars.Arts.Title: Arts
History.Title: HISTORY & LEGENDS
History.Subtitle: Tracing the footsteps of great figures who shaped the character and identity of Jepara throughout the ages.
History.Shima.Desc: Ruler of the Kalingga Kingdom renowned for her strict laws. A symbol of integrity and true justice from the past.
History.Kalinyamat.Desc: A respected maritime ruler of the Archipelago. Built Jepara into an unrivaled trade center and naval power.
History.Kartini.Desc: Emancipation hero who fought for women's education rights. Her figure inspires great change from Jepara for Indonesia.
Culture.Title: JEPARA CULTURE
Culture.Subtitle: Diverse festivals and preserved traditional ceremonies, becoming the identity and pride of the people of Bumi Kartini.
Tourism.Title: JEPARA HIGHLIGHTS
Tourism.Subtitle: Explore the natural beauty, cultural richness, and mesmerizing history in Bumi Kartini.
Culinary.Title: AUTHENTIC CULINARY
Culinary.Subtitle: Enjoy the authentic taste of Jepara's traditional cuisine, rich in spices and cultural heritage.
News.Title: NEWS & ANNOUNCEMENTS
Footer.Subtitle: Government of Jepara Regency
Footer.About: Official tourism and culture information center of Jepara Regency. Discover the beauty of nature and the cultural richness of Kartini.
